DataElement.preferredName: PROMIS 43 Adult Profile v2.0 SRPPER15_CaPS Have to Limit Things Done for Fun with Others Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Persons' stated observation of how often they have to limit the things they do for fun with others, using a five-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: PROMIS-43 Adult Profile v2.0 Have to Limit Things Done for Fun with Others Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A 43-item multidimensional and universal measure of health intended for use across a variety of conditions. It measures an adult patient's self-reported health status in seven domains: physical function, anxiety, depression, fatigue, sleep disturbance, pain interference, and participation in social roles._A question about whether an individual has or had to limit the things they do for fun with others._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A 43-item multidimensional and universal measure of health intended for use across a variety of conditions. It measures an adult patient's self-reported health status in seven domains: physical function, anxiety, depression, fatigue, sleep disturbance, pain interference, and participation in social roles.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used with the PROMIS items that describes a range of subjective scores for representing an individual's participation in social activities from 1: Always, to 5: Never.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: At all times; on every occasion.

Concepts.definition: At all times; on every occasion.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something happens or happened most of the time.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something happens or happened most of the time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

Concepts.definition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Added "Sometimes" to represent the MSAS value domain.ghd.01.27.15

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

Concepts.definition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ReferenceDocuments.name: I have to limit the things I
ReferenceDocuments.description: I have to limit the things I do for fun with others

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. The URL citation is provided so that caDSR users can obtain materials related to instructions for administering and/or scoring the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents. In cases where retaining the question set intact to preserve the validity and reliability are not as important as advancing the science, questions may be used individually or in combination with other measure questions.

DataElement.changeDescription: Created for ECOG-ACRIN study in Rave per request by S. Roulliard. mc 5/5/15
